ygData.subject: Re: Required times to memorize songs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I always thought it took incredible foresight and planning on Verant s part to make a game where after level 35, the only class that has to spend
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 6 Jan 2000, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:

> I think just about every bard out there wish it didn't take so long to
> memorize new songs. At 30th level, the low level songs aren't that big of a
> hassle anymore. It only takes a few seconds to memorize them. However, the

I always thought it took incredible foresight and planning on
Verant's part to make a game where after level 35, the only
class that has to spend annoyingly long periods of time
staring at their spellbooks were bards.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
